Timer.name: blackout
Timer.script: if snd.have_aff("blackout") then send("concentrate"..snd.sep.."compose"..snd.sep.."stand"..snd.sep.."eat vial"..snd.sep.."touch tree"..snd.sep.."smoke willow"..snd.sep.."drink health"..snd.sep.."eat anabiotic") cecho("\n<green>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. " Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) expandAlias("defup") else disableTimer("blackout") end

Timer.name: recklessblackouttimer
Timer.script:
if snd.have_aff("blackout") or snd.have_aff("recklessness") and snd.toggles.active then local percentesthealth = snd.percentesthealth*100 / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp local percentestmana = snd.percentestmana*100 / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp
if tonumber(percentesthealth) > 74 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 74 then cecho("
<green>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. " Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 50 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 75 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 50 and tonumber(percentestmana) < 75 then cecho("
<yellow>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. " Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 0 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 50 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 0 and tonumber(percentestmana) < 50 then cecho("
<red>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. " Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 74 and tonumber(snd.percentestmana) > 0 and tonumber(percentestmana) < 50 then cecho("
<green>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. "<red> Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 50 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 75 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 0 and tonumber(percentestmana) < 50 then cecho("
<yellow>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. "<red> Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 0 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 50 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 75 then cecho("
<red>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. "<green> Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 50 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 75 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 74 then cecho("
<yellow>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. "<green> Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 0 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 50 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 74 then cecho("
<red>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. "<green> Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) else cecho("
<yellow>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. " Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) end else disableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") end

Timer.name: salveretryretard
Timer.script: if snd.salveretry and not snd.have_aff("blackout") then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true if snd.aff_tally() == 0 then snd.salveaffflag = false snd.salveretry = false end disableTimer("salveretryretard") else snd.salvebal = false disableTimer("salveretryretard") end elseif not snd.salveretry then disableTimer("salveretryretard") end

Timer.name: salveretry
Timer.script: if snd.salveretry and not snd.have_aff("blackout") then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true if snd.aff_tally() == 0 then snd.salveaffflag = false snd.salveretry = false end disableTimer("salveretryretard") else snd.salvebal = false disableTimer("salveretryretard") end elseif not snd.salveretry then disableTimer("salveretryretard") end

Timer.name: looktimer
Timer.script: if not snd.channeling then snd.send("ql"..snd.sep.."ih") end disableTimer("looktimer") if snd.def_needed then expandAlias("defup") end

Timer.name: Firstaidstatustimer
Timer.script:
if snd.firstaid then
if snd.toggles.active then if snd.have_aff("hypothermia") and tonumber(snd.limblist.torso) > 1 then if snd.firstaidcuretrack.torso ~= "11" and snd.firstaidcuretrack.pretorso ~= "1" then send("FIRSTAID PRIORITY PRESTORE torso 1% 11") end elseif snd.have_aff("pre_restore_torso") then if snd.firstaidcuretrack.torso ~= "24" or snd.firstaidcuretrack.pretorso ~= "1" and snd.canprerestorenow then send("FIRSTAID PRIORITY PRESTORE torso 1% 24") end snd.canprerestorenow = true snd.firstaidchangecure = true elseif snd.have_aff("pre_restore_right_leg") then if snd.firstaidcuretrack.rightleg ~= "24" or snd.firstaidcuretrack.prerightleg ~= "1" and snd.canprerestorenow then send("FIRSTAID PRIORITY PRESTORE right leg 1% 24") end snd.canprerestorenow = true snd.firstaidchangecure = true elseif snd.have_aff("pre_restore_left_leg") then if snd.firstaidcuretrack.leftleg ~= "24" or snd.firstaidcuretrack.preleftleg ~= "1" and snd.canprerestorenow then send("FIRSTAID PRIORITY PRESTORE left leg 1% 24") end snd.canprerestorenow = true snd.firstaidchangecure = true elseif snd.have_aff("pre_restore_head") then if snd.firstaidcuretrack.head ~= "24" or snd.firstaidcuretrack.prehead ~= "1" and snd.canprerestorenow then send("FIRSTAID PRIORITY PRESTORE head 1% 24") end snd.canprerestorenow = true snd.firstaidchangecure = true elseif snd.have_aff("pre_restore_left_arm") then if snd.firstaidcuretrack.leftarm ~= "24" or snd.firstaidcuretrack.preleftarm ~= "1" and snd.canprerestorenow then send("FIRSTAID PRIORITY PRESTORE left arm 1% 24") end snd.canprerestorenow = true snd.firstaidchangecure = true elseif snd.have_aff("pre_restore_right_arm") then if snd.firstaidcuretrack.rightarm ~= "24" or snd.firstaidcuretrack.prerightarm ~= "1" and snd.canprerestorenow then send("FIRSTAID PRIORITY PRESTORE right arm 1% 24") end elseif snd.canprerestorenow then snd.canprerestorenow = false snd.firstaidchangecure = true end
snd.firstaidassist() snd.avoidancecheck() snd.unknownafter()
if snd.have_aff("nyctophobia") and gmcp.Char.Vitals.herb == "1" then send("firstaid priority nyctophobia 3") end
if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" and not snd.have_aff("anorexia") and not snd.have_aff("destroyed_throat") and (snd.defenses.def_harmony.state ~= "deffed" or snd.defenses.def_speed.state ~= "deffed" or snd.defenses.def_arcane.state ~= "deffed" or snd.defenses.def_levitation.state ~= "deffed") and snd.statustimer then snd.statustimer = false if statustimer_timer then killTimer(statustimer_timer) end statustimer_timer = tempTimer(300.0,[[snd.statustimer = true]])
elseif snd.defenses.def_fangbarrier.state ~= "deffed" and snd.salvebal and not snd.have_aff("slickness") and not snd.have_aff("slough") and snd.statustimer then snd.statustimer = false if statustimer_timer then killTimer(statustimer_timer) end statustimer_timer = tempTimer(300.0,[[snd.statustimer = true]])
--elseif snd.effuseready then --snd.effuseready = false -- send("press epidermal on torso") -- if effused_timer then killTimer(effused_timer) end -- effused_timer = tempTimer(3,[[snd.effuseready = true]]) elseif snd.have_aff("exhausted") and gmcp.Char.Vitals.herb == "1" and snd.aff_tally() < 2 then send("firstaid elevate exhausted") end end end

Timer.name: healretryretard
Timer.script: if snd.healretry then snd.healbalance = true disableTimer("healretryretard") else disableTimer("healretryretard") end

Timer.name: healretry
Timer.script: if snd.healretry then snd.healbalance = true disableTimer("healretry") else disableTimer("healretry") end

Timer.name: herbretry
Timer.script: if snd.herbretry == true then snd.herbalance = true disableTimer("herbretry") else disableTimer("herbretry") end

Timer.name: equilcheck
Timer.script: if not snd.channeling and not snd.toggles.survive then send("concentrate") end disableTimer("equilcheck")

Timer.name: reset check
Timer.script: if #snd.setting_priority > 0 then reset_cures = true local x = #snd.setting_priority while x > 0 and snd.firstaid_go do snd.firstaid_go = false snd.send("firstaid priority "..snd.setting_priority[x]) table.remove(snd.setting_priority, x) x = x - 1 end tempTimer(.2, [[snd.firstaid_go = true]]) else reset_cures = false end

Timer.name: Sneezy
Timer.script:
if not snd.spoken then local commands = {"A sneeze", "Snez", "Sneeze!"} local which = math.random(#commands)
snd.send("wt "..commands[which]) end snd.sneeze = false disableTimer("Sneezy")

Timer.name: Offenseenemybalancestimer
Timer.script: if (snd.focuscheck(1) or snd.treecheck(1) or snd.reconcheck(1) or snd.salvecovered(1)) and snd.target ~= "none" then snd.staone() end
